title: Where DePaul Grads Work  |  Academics  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Where DePaul Grads Work Where DePaul Grads Work DePaul graduates leave the university equipped with the tools, resources and connections to embark on inspiring careers across all industry sectors. Your unique education prepares you for the marketplace and provides flexibility in choosing and pursuing post-graduate options. Included here is sampling of recent alumni's employment destinations and positions. Back to Career Success Sample List of Employers for Sample List of Positions for Top Employers Recruit DePaul Grads 98% of the largest publicly held companies. 75% of privately held companies. 90% of the 'Best Places to Work' (2018)
